name: Masala Dosa
description: A crispy South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, stuffed with spiced potato filling and served with chutney and sambar.
ingredients: Rice, lentils, potatoes, curry leaves, mustard seeds, green chilies, turmeric

name: Mutton Biryani
description: A fragrant, slow-cooked rice dish layered with tender marinated mutton, saffron, caramelized onions, and aromatic spices.
ingredients: Basmati rice, mutton, saffron, ghee, caramelized onions, cloves, cardamom, yogurt

name: Drunken Noodles
description: Spicy and savory Thai noodles stir-fried with chicken, bell peppers, carrots, basil, and garlic in a flavorful soy sauce blend.
ingredients: Rice noodles, chicken, soy sauce, chili, garlic, basil, carrots, bell peppers

name: Chicken Shawarma Wrap
description: Tender marinated chicken wrapped in soft pita bread with garlic sauce, pickled cabbage, and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: Chicken, pita bread, garlic sauce, pickled vegetables, lettuce, onions
